3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Experience the allure of an Edwardian Top Flr 2BR+ STUDY or 3rdBR, 1.5 BA condo with charming architectural features, wood floors, fireplace and high ceilings. This sunlit residence offers a delightful space to unwind or entertain. Step onto a small deck for fresh air and stunning views or step down to the shared garden to relax. Conveniently located near Bart & Muni stations, exploring the city is effortless. Immerse yourself in the vibrant Mission neighborhood with its rich cultural heritage and captivating events. Indulge in culinary adventures on 24th Street's diverse restaurant scene. Delight in nearby theaters, murals and music. Commuting is easy with accessible highways connecting you to the Bay Area. Enjoy nearby parks for outdoor activities. Make 2941 Harrison Street your home and enjoy original architecture, convenient transportation, great dining and cultural events. This remarkable residence offers comfort, style and convenience. Truly a feel good place to call home.
Confidential Remarks: On the cusp of the Mission and North Bernal. This is a feel good condo :). 2Bed + Fainting room can be used as 3rd BD office. Nice open space

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Contractors Dream! First time on the market in 30+ years, nestled between the vibrant Mission & Potrero Hill sits this charming single-family home where opportunities abound. Don't let the rough condition discourage you from everything this house can be. Enter through a center hallway with arched access into a front parlor with a west-facing bay window, a spacious front bedroom, a hall bath, and a private rear bedroom with an ante-room. A large sunny eat-in kitchen is the heart of this home with eastern exposure, skylights, and direct access to the rear garden featuring a mature landscape including camelia, apple, and Meyer lemon trees. The ground floor has an unwarranted finished basement and bath and a garage plus ample storage. Steps to the trendy 21st and 24th St corridors with plenty of restaurants, shops & services. Easy go-anywhere transportation and freeway access. Walkers Paradise, Excellent Transit, and Very Bike-able. Nearby parks include 24th & York Mini Park, Potrero Del Sol Park, and Rolph Playground - 1125 Potrero Avenue is a place to call home!
Confidential Remarks: Showings: Close the front gate and make sure to lock both front and back doors after showings. UPDATED Offer Date: Wednesday, May 10th @ 1pm - Seller requests No Pre-emptives. Please send offers to both listing agents, Ric@RicRoc.com and Callista@CallistaSF.com. Pre-sale escrow opened with Chicago Title/Michael Yip, Email: yipm@ctt.com Escrow No.: FWPN-3552101511 -MY. Appreciate keeping escrow with CT/Yip Team, if agreeable, due to the sale-prep work completed re: Seller's Trust.

Remarks: Unparalleled modern design and amazing scale, Residence 111 is fully detached and perched on a 60' wide lot on the North Slope of Bernal Heights affording 270 degree views of the city and bay. This modern home is walking distance to Precita Park, Bernal Hill, and other amenities. It also boasts convenient access to both 280 and 101 Freeways for quick access to SF downtown, or the peninsula/south bay. The +/- 3400 square foot living space features four spacious bedrooms, three full baths and two half baths. Extraordinary flexible layout and high-design supports the needs of a modern lifestyle. 3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to 1477 Rhode Island Street in vibrant Potrero Hill! This stunning 1376 sq ft residence, located in a 2 unit building, boasts 3 bedrooms & 2.5 bathrooms. Step inside to an inviting open floor plan featuring hardwood floors & a gas fireplace. The west-facing windows offer panoramic views of the surrounding hills showcasing colorful San Francisco sunsets & creating the perfect backdrop for relaxing evenings. The gourmet kitchen is a chef's dream, with granite countertops, SS appliances including a Viking range, & a convenient island for meal prep and casual dining. The primary suite, located on the main level, provides a tranquil retreat with access to the shared backyard. Downstairs, you'll find two additional bedrooms, a well-appointed bathroom, & access to a private patio. The convenience of in-unit washer & dryer, garage parking & abundant storage adds to the appeal of this exceptional home. With easy access to major freeways & downtown San Francisco, this residence offers a perfect blend of comfort, modern living & convenience. Don't miss out on a rare opportunity to call 1477 Rhode Island Street your home!
Confidential Remarks: Vacant; Supra on front gate. Sq. ft. per tax record & is not warranted nor guaranteed by Broker nor Agent. Buyers to test parking to their satisfaction. Please call John Esplana with questions 650-315-5968

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Huge Price Reduction! Potrero Hill Victorian Home w/ automatic wooden gate entry. Immaculate remodel interior w/ Victorian charm & detail inc. wide plank wood floors & trim work, High Ceilings, skylights and lots of windows filling the home w/natural sunlight, as well as state-of-the-art technology i.e, smartphone controlled home automation, security gates, sprinklers & thermostat and more! Open floor plan living/dining/kitchen. The chef's kitchen has professional high-end appliances inc smart oven, contemporary custom cabinets and an island with bar seating. The primary suite features a bay window seating nook, a nice sized second bedroom, & third bedroom makes an ideal office/artist retreat. The primary bathroom is expansive w/built in sauna in large shower and radiant heated floors. There is also a conveniently located half bath/powder room. A beautifully planted backyard offers trailing vines, lots of greenery, bbq area and more. Basement with washer/dryer, lots of storage space and one car parking w smart garage door Amazon deliveries. Room for expansion + 2nd car in driveway! Backyard hatch leads to garage and both back & front yard have auto sprinklers! 240V electric in garage! Located in CTIP SFUSD School choice pref. Easy Freeway to North, East Bay or South Bay

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Located in the heart of North Bernal, near Bernal Hill and Precita Park, this stunning 4-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom home offers unparalleled elegance, comfort, and convenience. Featuring expansive west-facing windows that frame breathtaking magic hour sunsets, the main level welcomes you with soaring ceilings, hardwood floors, and a cozy wood-burning fireplace in the spacious living room. The gourmet kitchen, seamlessly connected to an open dining space with a convenient bar, is perfect for hosting gatherings. French doors lead to the expansive rear patio and yard, complete with a built-in grill, hot tub, and charming treehouse for an extra touch of relaxation and fun in your outdoor oasis. Upstairs, the luxurious primary suite boasts beautiful views and a fireplace, accompanied by 3 additional bedrooms and a convenient laundry closet, all on one level. Conveniently located near parks, cafes, and tech shuttle stops, with easy access to freeways for seamless connectivity. Enjoy stunning vistas of Sutro Tower and city lights from every vantage point. With a 2-car garage and ample storage, this home effortlessly combines style and functionality, offering the ultimate urban retreat in the coveted Bernal Heights neighborhood.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Impeccably renovated Victorian home in sought-after Bernal Height's North Slope. Designed to entertain. Originally built in 1902, it was extensively remodeled in 2014-2015, w/recent updates in 2023. Main house boasts 3 bds, 3 bas, exquisite craftsmanship. Living room with gas fireplace, partial downtown views. Formal dining room. Renovated chef's kitchen with marble countertops, Miele & Subzero appliances custom cabinets nad bar with wine fridge. Hrdwd flrs throughout main house & new LVT in apt. Top-floor primary suite breakfast bar, walk-in closet, step out south deck for morning coffee & luxury bath w/double vanity, soaking tub & Steam shower. Rooftop deck with downtown/city views. Second bedroom with downtown vistas. 3rd bedroom/office with renovated bath. South facing oasis garden w/living wall, fountain & awesome outdoor kit w/Gas/wood/charcoal grill, kegerator, fridge & sound. Smart home features throughout. Attached renovated Jr 1 bdrm apt w/full kitchen, redone full ba & laundry. 2 car sxs garage w/wheely bike lifts, dog wash, EV Charger & more! Huge north-facing deck with downtown/hill views. Prime location with quick access to 101/280. Close to village neighborhoods including Cortland Ave, Precita Park, The Inner Mission, and the Valencia/Guerrero Corridor
Confidential Remarks: Sold with 2 offers after initial price reduction.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Bernal Heights Charmer: Three level Edwardian Style single family home. Top Floor features two bedrooms and 1 full bath with city views. The main level features an additional 2 bedrooms and one bath plus an open floor plan with a large living room, updated kitchen, formal dining room, breakfast area with a wet bar for entertainment. French doors open to a small deck facing the rear yard and city views. Inside the entryway on the street level there is an office and a half bath. Also on the the lower level is a granny unit (not warranted by sellers or agent) with 2 bedrooms and 1 bath and a complete kitchen and separate laundry closet & access to yard. The rear yard features a Cabana for your exercise or yoga routine plus a peaceful garden with a patio and mature fruit trees. The property has been thoughtfully remodeled leaving many period details intact. Conveniently located within a half block of Precita Park, Coffee Shops and many restaurants. EZ access to 101 and 280 freeways, MUNI, BART and transportation.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This top floor 3bed / 1 bath Edwardian home is ideally situated in one of the most desirable enclaves of Bernal Heights north slope, just steps from Precita Park! The open concept kitchen, dining, and living areas offer stunning views to the East and overlook a manicured garden ideal for hosting an afternoon BBQ or sun bathing on a relaxing weekend. Elegant period detail, hardwood floors, and bright bay windows bring the space to life, showcasing old-world charm complimented by a tastefully updated kitchen with a center island perfect for entertaining. Three full sized bedrooms offer plenty of space to spread out, plus the bonus room at rear doubles as laundry area and home office with views to downtown SF. A new foundation in 2019 provides plenty of space for deeded parking and storage. Walk up the hill and enjoy views from Bernal Heights Park or head down to Valencia St/24th Street corridors for world-class dining and shopping. EZ access to HWY 101 and BART

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Vibrant 3BR Inner Mission Victorian Retreat with Garden Cottage and the sunniest yard -- steps to everything! Period details blend with modern amenities in a bright, flexible floor plan. Main level has LR/DR with soaring ceilings and hardwood floors, eat-in bar area, remodelled kitchen with deco tile floors and Thermador and Bosch appliances, a stylish BA, and 2 bedrooms separated from the primary with a lovely garden window seat. Step outside to your cozy deck, with stairs to a tranquil yard with colorful plants (bougainvillea, magnolia, lavender+) and fruit trees, wrap-around bench seating, outdoor shower, large faux-grassy play area and tiled patio, all perfect for entertaining and California living. The detached, charming cottage is at the back of the lot with a loft, LR, BA and Eat-in-kitchen, ideal for guests, in-laws or au pair quarters. BONUS: many usable spaces at garden level, including informal media/LR, abundant storage/flex space, a lounge/yoga area, laundry room and 1-car garage with workbench. Centrally located on a great block of York, steps to cafes', restaurants, boutiques and parks. Easy access to fwy, Muni and BART. A true urban retreat - come experience for you
Confidential Remarks: SQFT: There are multiple square footage numbers from a variety of resources. Cottage and Garden Level Bonus Room is included in the Square Footage. Buyers & buyer's agents shall conduct their own research into the total sq footage and legality of room downstairs.

Public Remarks: Its hard to pick one thing to love about this home. Is the weather the best thing? According to the Golden Gate Weather Service this house is in the warmest, sunniest patch of SF. Right around Garfield Square. Glorious kitchen with stainless-steel appliances, lots of counter space. The kitchen is completely open to the living/dining area with a bay window. Beautiful floors. This house is all about lifestyle. Entertaining and family living. On this floor there is a bedroom being used as an office right now and a full bathroom which is gorgeous. The second floor has a huge primary suite w/ bath. Lovely full hall bath, the third bedroom and large nook under eaves with a window that overlooks the amazing backyard full of fruit trees. Currently used as a nursery. Additionally, a sunny backyard full of fruit trees and space for a garden, big 2 car garage with a third full bath, great neighbors. Vibrant neighborhood. Walk/bike/transit friendly. Parks/restaurants/shops. Best neighborly feel!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Indulge in sophisticated living in this meticulously crafted in 2020 three story modern home. Revel in the majestic open living floor plan and enjoy the convenience of three bedrooms and three bathrooms seamlessly aligned on a the top level. The chef's kitchen is a culinary masterpiece with MSI quartz countertops, a cascading waterfall island, and an exclusive Thermador appliances suite, complemented by integrated speakers for seamless entertainment. Luxuriate in opulent Madeli vanities, Porcellanosa tiles, and Toto toilets in all bathrooms, alongside custom closet systems, floor-to-ceiling solid wood doors, and a spa-like master bath. Natural light streams through Weathershield windows and Hunter Douglas blinds enhancing the beauty of the European white oak floors, while a manicured and private backyard, a convenient balcony off the living room and a 360' view roof deck beckons outdoor enjoyment. The ground-level legal second unit, with a custom kitchen, spacious bedroom, and well-appointed amenities, extends versatility for guests or family. This residence isn't just a home; it's the pinnacle of sophistication and modern living, surpassing expectations at every corner. Welcome to a residence where luxury meets functionality.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This rare vintage 3BD/2BA Bernal North-slope turn-of-the-century Victorian with room to grow is ready for the next owner's vision and passion! 1645 Florida, which has been in one family for many years, greets visitors with a bright formal living room, formal dining room with doors to the private rear deck, eat-in kitchen, large bedroom and full bath, all on the main living level. Upstairs is a cozy family room with downtown views in between two additional ample bedrooms. Downstairs on the ground floor is a large bonus room ready for home office, media room or primary suite addition, a full bath, laundry room, storage areas, and an attached garage with interior access. The home appears bigger than the tax record square footage (and rooms and bath down be unwarranted). Charming period details, high ceilings and lots of reconfiguration options run throughout. Out back is a rear deck and yard ready for gardening, entertainment and play. Excellent Bernal location close to local parks , dining coffee, local schools, shopping, tech shuttle stops, easy BART, MUNI and freeway access, and more!
Confidential Remarks: Broker's note: Buyers should verify all Sq Ft, disclosures, and permit history and bed and bath count and legality for themselves. Buyers should get any and all inspections they deem necessary.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Wonderful Single Family Home in the heart of the coveted Protrero District. Unlock the endless possibilities of this 3 Bedrooms / 1 Bathroom home. The large living room, formal dining room, and modern kitchen create the perfect home to live and entertain. The thoughtful floor plan separates all 3 bedrooms and bathroom, with claw foot bathtub, to the upper floor. Enjoy the sunshine from your private deck or expansive backyard with mature trees. Outside of your front door, walk to all that Protrero has to offer. Walk to nearby parks, tennis and basketball courts, playgrounds or the community garden. Or stroll to 24th Street and partake in the vibrant culture, and enjoy the many restaurants and businesses that have thrived in the neighborhood for generations. Don't miss this opportunity to own 1255 Protrero!

Confidential Remarks: This home is located on a great block and was fully renovated in 2018. The following items were replaced in 2018 (this is not an exhaustive list): foundation, plumbing, electrical, roof, windows, drywall, and interior finishings. The current owner has made numerous high-end upgrades since purchase, including AC (Carrier Infinity variable speed internet connected system), six Nest thermostats for each radiant heat zone, a whole home wifi system with four hardwired wireless access points, a chandelier in the dining area, and wall painting in the dining area by decorative artist Caroline Lizarraga. Easy to show - please call or text Patrick at 415.533.3518 for showing instructions/disclosures.
Public Remarks: This stunning home, exquisitely reimagined and fully renovated in 2018, truly has it all. With soaring ceilings and an open floor plan, the residence is bathed in natural light from skylights. The open-concept great room, anchored by a substantial kitchen island, is perfect for hosting gatherings with loved ones. Thoughtfully designed, the spacious floor plan boasts four bedrooms and four full bathrooms, with two en-suite rooms conveniently located downstairs, providing an ideal balance of comfort and versatility. A comprehensive renovation in 2018 included the replacement of the foundation, plumbing, electrical, roof, windows, and interior finishings. Recent high-end upgrades feature a Carrier Infinity variable speed internet-connected AC system, six Nest thermostats for each radiant heat zone, a whole-home Wi-Fi system with four hardwired wireless access points, a chandelier in the dining area, and a custom wall painting by Decorative Artist Caroline Lizarraga. Discover a serene oasis within the outdoor space, perfectly situated in a convenient location. This is modern luxury living at its finest!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Meticulously renovated, this three level Victorian-era residence has been transformed into an ultra-sophisticated modern beauty. Offering warm contemporary finishes with an open, welcoming floor plan, the home features a sleek European-inspired gourmet kitchen featuring cutting edge design with high-end Bertazzoni and Thermador appliances. Desirable floor plan with each bedroom having its own en-suite bathroom. Abundant natural light floods throughout most rooms. With careful attention to detail in every room, this showcase property impresses on every level, creating an amazing atmosphere for both the homebody and the entertainer. The fully finished lower level has a wonderful family/media room and a cedar-lined wine cellar. The garage can accommodate one to two cars and offers an EV charger. The property includes a new roof with warranty, extensive renovations throughout, all-new fixtures and appliances, and a new heating and AC system. Situated just steps away from vibrant Mission District shops and restaurants, multiple Muni lines and easy access to major freeways.
Confidential Remarks: Offers anytime. Contact Listing Agent for showings. Pre-escrow opened with Kathie Ng, WFG National Title, kng@wfgtitle.com; Escrow #23-187163.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Exceptional Bernal Heights location just steps away from Precita Park! Located in a classic 2-Unit Edwardian, this impeccable top-floor TIC seamlessly blends elegant period details, historical architecture & trendy designer finishes across a sensible floor plan. Enjoy light filled windows, preserved hardwood flooring, beautiful millwork & moldings. Remodeled kitchen with two tones cabinets, Caesarstone countertops, stainless steel appliances and central island. Combo living/dining room with gas fireplace and eastern outlooks. Spacious Primary Bedroom with en-suite bathroom and direct access to a charming shared yard with mature planting. A 2nd bedroom and full bath with soaking tub complete the offering. Private 1-car garage with additional storage and washer/dryer. Minutes from Bernal Hill, the Mission District, cafes, restaurants, shops, transportation, freeway access & all locals favorites. The best of city living!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Come find your home in the sunny and laid-back Mission District of San Francisco. Located across from a park and close to the vibrant 24th Street corridor, you will find many things nearby to make you happy, including restaurants and bars, shopping, easy freeway access and public transportation for commuters. Top Floor, 2-Level, totally redone 3-bed, 3-bath with A private roof deck plus two Private Rear Patios. 1-Carport parking with EV capacity and individual storage space. Fast track condo potential/2-units total in building and units are separately metered. This Brand New, down to the studs full renovation includes structural steel seismic upgrade components, new 100 AMP electrical to the unit plus common area panel, acoustic sound insulation between units, new foundation, roof and plumbing, Marvin windows and James Hardie siding. Enjoy your washer/dryer closet in-unit as well as individually programmable, hydronic forced-air room heating. This home is close to Potrero Hill, Bernal and Noe, as well as the Zuckerberg Memorial Hospital.
Confidential Remarks: Your clients will appreciate the quality of this rehab. The lower unit was recently sold and is in similar condition. 1st bathroom on first level of unit- mirror is staging and not included in sale. Shower enclosures have been installed for the two showers without bathtubs

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: REDUCED AGAIN! An unbeatable price for this beautifully updated view home on the coveted north slope of Bernal Heights. On a tree-lined block close to Precita Park, Mullen Peralta Park, and several other parks, this location offers easy access to many neighborhood shops, cafes, and restaurants. The main level features an open floorplan with kitchen, pantry, dining room, living room, and a walkout deck overlooking the spacious, landscaped garden. Upstairs you will find the primary bedroom with magnificent vistas and another walkout deck. Also on this level are a guest bedroom, a nursery or den, and an office/sitting area underneath a large oval skylight. Downstairs is a flexible in-law unit with independent access that can be used as a separate studio, family room, or guest room. Conveniently located near both highways 280 and 101, as well as public transportation, it is easy to get where you are going from this superb home.
Confidential Remarks: Property is 2 units, but used primarily as a single family home. For showing requests please contact Paul 415.407.8019 paul@applegarthwarrin.com or Holly 415.444.6403 holly@applegarthwarrin.com.
